page.title: 08WILDEN'S COMMUNITY SERVICES.
page.content: {PUBLIC TRANSPORT. Regrettably the time-tabling of buses does not encourage people to use the service to travel to & from work. The service is largely used by shoppers.However there was a consensus that the bus service was adequate. {MOBILE LIBRARY.} This only visits the village once a month - a declining service. {MOBILE CLINIC.} A service much appreciated by young mothers. {MEALS ON WHEELS.} A twice-weekly service, provided by the WRVS. Vital, especially for the elderly handicapped people in the area. {RURAL MEDICAL SERVICE.} Provides transport for visits to the doctor,dentist, optician, hospitals etc.Prescriptions collected.
